attributes.action: bring in a law were poeple are alerted if their new partner has any previous convictions against children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My son was shaken at 15 wks old by a man i trusted,what I didnt know was that he had a previous conviction for a similar offence against a young child.
My son has been left brain damaged and blind and will need care for the rest of his life,something needs to be done to protect our children.
